Body:
create_test_file()
db = dapt.db.Delimited_file('test.csv', ',')
db.update_cell(1, 'status', 'adding')
expected = []
expected.append(OrderedDict({'id': 't1', 'startTime': '2019-09-06 17:23',
    'endTime': '2019-09-06 17:36', 'status': 'finished', 'a': '2', 'b': '4',
    'c': '6'}))
expected.append({'id': 't2', 'startTime': '', 'endTime': '', 'status':
    'adding', 'a': '10', 'b': '10', 'c': ''})
expected.append({'id': 't3', 'startTime': '', 'endTime': '', 'status': '',
    'a': '10', 'b': '-10', 'c': ''})
assert db.get_table(
    ) == expected, 'Cannot update a cell in the delimited file.'
